newsitem.title: ESTONIA: 60.4 PCT OF PREDICTED STATE REVENUE COLLECTED.
newsitem.headline: 60.4 PCT OF PREDICTED STATE REVENUE COLLECTED.

text.p: Total revenue collected in the first seven months was 7.6 billion kroons, the ministry said in a statement.
During the month of July, 1.59 billion kroons or 12.6 percent of planned revenue was received in the budget.
The increase in July was due to receipts from the sale of the Estonian Shipping Company, which was not planned for in the draft budget, the ministry added.
